Literature.Title: Isopedopeptins A-H: Cationic Cyclic Lipodepsipeptides from Pedobacter cryoconitis UP508 Targeting WHO Top-Priority Carbapenem-Resistant Bacteria
Literature.Author: Nord C, Bjerketorp J, Levenfors JJ, Cao S, Strömstedt AA, Guss B, Larsson R, Hughes D, Öberg B, Broberg A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli LMG 15862(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii LMG 1041(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae LMG 2783(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae LMG 20218(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa LMG 6395(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus LMG 15975(MIC=32µg/ml),Bacillus cereus CCUG 7414T(MIC=>32µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus J7(MIC=>32µg/ml),Candida albicans H-29(MIC=32µg/ml),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(IC50=56µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=2µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli D22(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli mcr(MIC=2µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µg/ml)
